meta.title: Avalon Studio City - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Studio City - Apartments in Los Angeles, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with activities and possibility, Avalon Studio City offers newly renovated apartments for lease just steps from Ventura Boulevard and near Griffith Park. Inside our community, you'll find thoughtfully designed one- and two-bedroom apartment homes that boast high ceilings, large walk-in closets, and private patios and balconies. Our newly renovated apartments feature kitchens with quartz countertops, tile backsplash, new cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and hard surface plank flooring. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Avalon Studio City is within walking distance to excellent LA dining, shopping, and night-life. Live your life effortlessly, with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, resident lounge, swimming pool, and wifi lounge. This is not just apartment living. This is living up. Apartment homes include features for persons with disabilities required by the Federal Fair Housing Act.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.h2: Only the best for your best life

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: See what we do to take pet friendly living to the next level.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: From fitness amenities to resident perks, we offer a variety of spaces and places to help you meet your wellness goals.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with activities and possibility, Avalon Studio City offers newly renovated apartments for lease just steps from Ventura Boulevard and near Griffith Park. Inside our community, you'll find thoughtfully designed one- and two-bedroom apartment homes that boast high ceilings, large walk-in closets, and private patios and balconies. Our newly renovated apartments feature kitchens with quartz countertops, tile backsplash, new cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and hard surface plank flooring. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Avalon Studio City is within walking distance to excellent LA dining, shopping, and night-life. Live your life effortlessly, with amenities that include a state-of-the-art fitness center, resident lounge, swimming pool, and wifi lounge. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.
